****Tender Announcement****

### Supply Title
**Convergence and Modernization of Credit Risk Models and Rating Management Platform**

### Tender Reference
*   CB-340-35799314
*   Solicitation Number: 24-811
*   Amendment Number: 1

### Tender Publication and Closue Details
*   **Publication Date**: 2024-06-12
*   **Closue Date**: 2024-06-27 (at 13:00:00 EST)

### Supplier Details
*   **Contracting Entity Name**: Export Development Canada
*   **Contracting Entity Address**: 150 Slater Street, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada K1A 1K3

### Tender Details
*   **Supply Description**: Export Development Canada (EDC) invites proposals to provide a cloud-based platform that converges multiple credit risk models and rating management capabilities into a centralized environment. The supplier must replace EDC’s legacy risk tools, provide a single platform for credit modeling and rating, and support multiple functions including robust risk rating workflow approvals, ECL functionality, and the use of machine learning/AI, ESG/Climate Risk modelling and data, and Asset and Liability Management capabilities.
*   **Trade Agreements**: This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) trade agreements.
*   **Region of Opportunity**: Ottawa and the National Capital Region (NCR)

### Important Contact Information
*   **Contact Person**: Scott Farrell
*   **Contact E-mail**: sfarrell@edc.ca
*   **Phone Number**: (343) 551-7454

### Notice URL and Attachments
The solicitation notice and supporting documentation can be found at the following URL:

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/40034/acan-24-811---fact-to-creditlens.pdf (English)

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/40034/acan-24-811---fact-to-creditlens_fra_1.pdf (French)

### Disclaimer
This notice does not constitute a solicitation until the publication of a formal invitation for bids or RFP. Suppliers are responsible for ensuring the accuracy and completeness of their tenders before submission and are entitled to seek clarification on technical requirements as part of its solicitation activities.

>This is an Electronic Tender
